sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"宽阔的"之意。
means: broad ： 普通用词，指向两边延伸的宽度，强调两边之间面积的广阔，也可指向四方伸展开去。
wide ： 常用词，侧重指两边或两点之间的距离。着重距离的远近。

sentence.Network_en: The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

sentence.Network_en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentence.Network_en: A girl was attacked on a train in broad daylight.
sentence.Network_cn: 光天化日之下，一个女孩在火车上遭到了袭击。

广谱(Broad Spectrum)标示：防晒霜需要同时具备针对长波紫外线辐射(UVA)和中波紫外线辐射(UVB)的两种保护才能被归类为“广谱”。
百老汇（Broad Way）：百老汇本是印第安人所辟的一条羊肠小道，如今它已变成一条宽22到45米，长50里，两旁大厦如林、高楼蔽 …
这是宽街（Broad Street），牛津大学的许多重要的建筑和学院就在这条街上。牛津大学的记录可以追溯到12世纪，尽管在这以前可能 …

jx.jx_en_mean: during the day, when it is light, and surprising or unexpected for this reason

lj.lj_ly: the kidnap had taken place in broad daylight.
lj.lj_ls: 绑架发生在光天化日之下。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  brād, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch breed and German breit

entry.def: Something that is broad is wide.

example.ex: His shoulders were broad and his waist narrow...
The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
example.tran: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

entry.def: A broad smile is one in which your mouth is stretched very wide because you are very pleased or amused.

example.ex: He greeted them with a wave and a broad smile.
example.tran: 他向他们挥一下手，热情地笑着向他们打招呼。

entry.def: You use broad to describe something that includes a large number of different things or people.

example.ex: A broad range of issues was discussed.
example.tran: 讨论涉及了范围十分广泛的一系列议题。

example.ex: ...a broad coalition of workers, peasants, students and middle class professionals.
example.tran: 工人、农民、学生和中产阶级职业人士的广泛联盟

entry.def: You use broad to describe a word or meaning which covers or refers to a wide range of different things.

example.ex: The term Wissenschaft has a much broader meaning than the English word 'science'.
example.tran: Wissenschaft这个术语比英语词science含义更广。

example.ex: ...restructuring in the broad sense of the word.
example.tran: 按这个词最广义的解释进行重构

entry.def: You use broad to describe a feeling or opinion that is shared by many people, or by people of many different kinds.

example.ex: The agreement won broad support in the US Congress.
example.tran: 这一协议在美国国会中赢得了广泛的支持。
具有广泛吸引力的电影

entry.tran: （描述或想法）大致的，概括的，笼统的
entry.def: A broad description or idea is general rather than detailed.

example.ex: These documents provided a broad outline of the Society's development...
example.tran: 这些文件勾画出了社会发展的大致框架。

example.ex: In broad terms, this means that the closer you live to a school, the more likely it is that your child will get a place there.
example.tran: 笼统地说，你住得离某学校越近，你的孩子就越有可能进入该校上学。

entry.def: A broad hint is a very obvious hint.

example.ex: They've been giving broad hints about what to expect.
example.tran: 他们对将会出现什么情况已作了明白的暗示。

entry.def: A broad accent is strong and noticeable.

example.ex: ...a Briton who spoke in a broad Yorkshire accent.
example.tran: 一个讲话带有浓重约克郡口音的英国人

entry.tran: 女人，娘们（可能具冒犯意味）
entry.def: Some men refer to women as broads. This use could cause offence.

sentences.sentence: "a broad is a woman who can throw a mean punch"

means.word_mean: 1. having great (or a certain) extent from one side to the other;

sentences.sentence: "a panoptic study of Soviet nationality"- T.G.Winner
"gave us a broad hint that it was time to leave"

means.word_mean: 5. being at a peak or culminating point;
6. very large in expanse or scope;

example.en: Sony，lady. no broads allowed in here.
example.zh: 对不起，女士，女士不得导入内。

example.en: This pushy broad comes up to me and asks if I have any manners.
example.zh: 这个好出风头的娘们走上前来问我懂不懂规矩。
她是个相貌还可以的妓女。

example.en: The guy was running around with his broad showing.
example.zh: 那家伙光着屁股东奔西跑。

list.explanation: (broads)票证(可指身份证或信用卡等)

example.en: Don't forget to bring the broads of credit with you.
example.zh: 你别总忘随身带上信用卡。

example.en: The under-worldlings tried to fake the broads.
example.zh: 歹徒们曾想方设法要伪造证件。

auth_sentence.content: The broad thrust is devastating criticism of the police.
auth_sentence.res_content: The broad thrust is devastating criticism of the police.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The broad thrust is devastating criticism of the police.

auth_sentence.content: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.

auth_sentence.content: There was a broad recovery in Japanese car companies.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was a broad recovery in Japanese car companies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was a broad recovery in Japanese car companies.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 宽的, 阔的, 广泛的
往国外, 到处, 海外
stems_affixes.word_buile: a=at+broad宽广→在宽广的地方→在海外
broad宽广+cast投射→n.广播, 播音
broadcast[n.广播, 播音]+ing状态→n.广播

Sentence.sentence: We need to continue to value broad preparation in thinking skills that will serve for a lifetime.
Broader definitions of the sharing economy include peer-to-peer lending or putting a solar panel on your roof and selling power back to the gr/d ( 电网)
They have a broader knowledge of nutrition, so they buy more fresh fruit and vegetables than ever before
the definition of unemployment is too broad
Professor Robert Summers at Cornell Law School banned laptop computers from his thinks qualified lawyers need to possess a broad array of complex reasoning abilities
Declaring that one country is better than another in the way that it treats more than half its citizens means relying on broad strokes and generalities.

jushi.english: The banana tree has broad leaves.
jushi.chinese: 香蕉树的叶子又宽又大。

jushi.english: He stated his view in broad outline.
jushi.chinese: 他概括地陈述了自己的观点。

jushi.english: I have a broad general idea of your plan: now give me the details.
jushi.chinese: 我已经了解你们计划的大概情况,现在请告诉我计划的细节。
